name: Wild Beasts
description:
Summon beasts with various abilities and combine their strenght to beat your opponent. Be stronger, be faster and become the king of the forest!

How to: Every beast has beast power which adds to your total power if summoned. Have more beast power than your opponent before either of you summon a Bear which immediately starts a combat. Who has more power wins.

Controls: Mouse only

Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 in 1 week with a theme of "Stronger together"
